and then we say not what happens after
that
remember verb ing so you were not

playing soccer you can also use a

reading at home in

now let's start a check up of the when

I wasn't for I was not now the problem

remember we need to add an ING to the

weekend let's move on now for this
checkup we'll look at the while usage of

the first example while I blink someone
blink my bike when we use while in the
past continuous tense we're showing that
two actions happened at the same time in
the past or they were happening at the
same time in the past so we need to use
the past continuous for both actions
while I blink I want you to use shop in
the first blank remember the subject
here is I so I need to use the be verb

now someone can be a he or she therefore

someone was stealing
my bike the next sentence says while he
